sentences.en: a conventional plot about love and marriage
a strong believer in conventional morals
sentences.cn: 坚守传统道德观念的人

sentences.en: Alternative treatments can provide a useful back-up to conventional treatment.
sentences.cn: 替代疗法能为传统的治疗提供有效的辅助。

sentences.en: Bake for 20 minutes in a conventional oven; 8 in a microwave.
sentences.cn: 在传统的烤炉中烘烤20分钟，在微波炉里则烤8分钟。

sentences.en: Biofuels can be mixed with conventional fuels.
sentences.cn: 生物燃料可以和传统燃料混合使用。

sentences.en: Britain must still keep the nuclear and conventional capacity to deal with all conceivable threats.
sentences.cn: 英国仍须保持核武器和常规武器的生产能力，以应对各种潜在威胁。

sentences.en: Fundamentally, it was a conventional bomber, but it had a number of interesting innovations.
sentences.cn: 从根本上说，那是一架常规轰炸机，但是有许多有意思的创新。

sentences.en: He abhors the wheeling-and-dealing associated with conventional political life.
sentences.cn: 他憎恨传统政治生活中的尔虞我诈。

sentences.en: He hates the wheeling and dealing associated with conventional political life.
sentences.cn: 他对传统政治生活中的权术钻营深恶痛绝。

sentences.en: He will try his utmost to help them by means of his conventional medical knowledge.
sentences.cn: 他将会用自己的传统医学知识尽全力帮助他们。

sentences.en: I want to reiterate that our conventional weapons are superior.
sentences.cn: 我要再次重申，我们的常规武器是一流的。

sentences.en: Internet connections through conventional phone lines are fairly slow.
sentences.cn: 通过传统的电话线来连接因特网速度很慢。

sentences.en: These discs hold more than 400 times as much information as a conventional computer floppy disk.
sentences.cn: 这些光盘能容纳的信息量是普通计算机软盘的400多倍。

sentences.en: They are all about twenty years old, serious, smart, a bit conventional perhaps, but uniformly pleasant.
sentences.cn: 他们全部20岁左右，严肃、聪明，也许还有点传统，但是都很讨人喜欢。

sentences.en: This extremist organization has shunned conventional politics.
sentences.cn: 这个极端主义组织有意避开了传统政治。

sentences.en: This remarkable technology provides far greater clarity than conventional x-rays.
sentences.cn: 这项卓越技术的清晰度比常规的X光高得多。

sentences.en: This theory is widely derided by conventional scientists.
sentences.cn: 这一理论遭到了守旧派科学家的普遍嘲笑。

sentences.en: We must reduce the danger of war by controlling nuclear, chemical and conventional arms.
sentences.cn: 我们必须通过控制核武器、化学武器和常规武器的数量来减少战争的危险。

words.tran_cn: 大会；[法] 惯例；[计] 约定；[法] 协定；习俗
惯例化；习俗化；象征手法化
使照惯例；俗化（conventionalize的过去式及过去分词）
使习俗化；使样式化；使照惯例

trans.tran_en: a conventional method, product, practice etc has been used for a long time and is considered the usual type
